citations.narrative:
An open bag of chicken scratch was found in the feed storage shed. This needs to be secured so that it does not attract
vermin. Vermin will compromise the animal feed in the storage area.
Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration,
molding, or contamination by vermin.
Correct by: 05-14-2021

The automatic waterer for the llama was dirty and had algae in the bottom. This receptacle needs to be cleaned and
fresh water added for the animal. All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary.
Correct by end of business day 05-13-2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Recreational Director.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An open bag of chicken scratch was found in the feed storage shed.  This needs to be secured so that it does not attract 
vermin.  Vermin will compromise the animal feed in the storage area. 
Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, 
molding, or contamination by vermin. 
 
Correct by:  05-14-2021 
3.130 
   
Watering. 
The automatic waterer for the llama was dirty and had algae in the bottom.  This receptacle needs to be cleaned and 
fresh water added for the animal.  All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary. 
 
Correct by end of business day 05-13-2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Recreational Director.

End Section
